descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/6774/bladeshd.jpg[/IMG]

This is just a texture replacement, or rather, enhancement, to the Blades armour and shield.

uploading this as a tester, to see if people would like all the vanilla armours to recieve the same enhancements i offer :)

please, feel free to endorse and leave feedback



[b]Installation:[/b]

Extract the texture file in the .rar file into the skyrim/data  or alternatively activate it through NMM

[b]Uninstallation:[/b]

remove the armour/blades and weapon/blades directories from their parent Textures file in the sky/data folder

or use NMM to deactive it
[/center]
author: Dhegonus
